<!-- Check all that apply -->

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)

## Checklist

<!-- Check all items before submitting -->

- [ ] My code follows the code style of this project (PSR-12)
- [ ] My code passes PHPStan max level with zero errors
- [ ] I have run `composer fix` to auto-fix code style issues
- [ ] I have added/updated unit tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally (`composer test:unit`)
- [ ] I have added necessary documentation (PHPDoc, README, inline comments)
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if user-facing change)
- [ ] My commit messages follow the Conventional Commits format
- [ ] My branch is up-to-date with the `main` branch
